item.description:
Come join us for another 4 week dance workshop!  This time we will be dancing cha-cha and salsa.  No experience required and no partner required.

8 people minimum, otherwise we will have to cancel. $40 per person, full payment required upfront.

The studio is hard to find- the entrance is not on Cottage Ave.  Park in the pay lot (cheap) behind The Fours.  There is an alley to the left of The Fours and the entrance to the studio is in the alley.  The studio sign says Danceworks.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Dance - 4 week Cha-cha/Salsa Workshop
